vsParam:
Sigh, the documents are piling up...
Gosh, I have to deal with them as his secretary!

[px], something just occurred to me.
Could you make "Soul Mirror" with alchemy?

Yeah! You could just make a "Soul Mirror" with alchemy...
as it's not at hand. Angelica, you're so smart!

Hehe, thank you...
How about that? Could it work?

It'll be hard even for [px] to make it from scratch.
After all, it's an extremely special item...
But if we could find a shard of the mirror, maybe...

Hey... Let's go to the Mermaid Rock to try our luck?
It's collapsed, but probably...

Probably we could find a shard of the mirror...
What do you think, [px]?

Yeah, right!
Let's go to the Mermaid Rock!

Wait for us, Verbena! We will fulfill Lord Rod's wish...
to make him and his love happy together!

They're willing to do all this for someone else. Hehe,
the young generation is not good-for-nothing.
